motds.title: Nightmare Yule Set
motds.body: They may look sweet, but turn on these minty monsters and you'll face a swift stab in the back.

motds.title: Reboot A Friend Beta
motds.body: Sign up for the Reboot A Friend Beta, play matches with your friends, and unlock free rewards! Learn more at fn.gg/rebootafriend

messages.title: Keep Your Account Secure
messages.body: Avoid scam sites offering free V-Bucks. Epic will never ask for your password. Enable Two-Factor Authentication to help stay secure!

messages.title: Keep Your Account Secure
messages.body: Avoid scam sites offering free V-Bucks. Epic will never ask for your password. Enable Two-Factor Authentication to help stay secure!

messages.title: Cocoa .45
messages.body: The hottest of Silenced pistols is returning. These projectiles are off the wall!

messages.title: Ice Queen
messages.body: Freeze your foes in their tracks with an icy welcome. Use Seismic Smash to freeze enemies with Ice Queen!

messages.title: New Wave Holiday
messages.body: The horde is getting restless and the waves keep coming! Eliminate them all to advance, but be warned, thereâ€™s snowhere to hide.
